DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect evaluate long-term safety effectiveness data Exactech® NOVATION ™ Ceramic Articulation Hip System ( `` NOVATION ™ Ceramic AHS '' ) . Ten ( 10 ) year follow-up data collect study . The first five ( 5 ) year subject follow-up involve clinical ( Harris Hip Score , adverse event ) , radiographic , self-assessment evaluation . The remain five ( 5 ) year subject follow-up accomplish outcome questionnaire complete subject evaluate survivorship status hip replacement .
